A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have been a fan for 34 years. I love star wars. I don't understand the hate for this film. It was absolutely fantastic. The story was tight and thrilling. The characters had humor and there was a lot of tension throughout the movie. ALL\, of the battles were so well done and intense. It made me feel as if i were watching a continuation of the original trilogy. Way better than force awakens for sure. Sucks that so many hated it\, i thought it was great and i will see it again.
